item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes üöÄ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

My work is focused on regional to global scale methods, analyses and products that improve our understanding of Earth’s glaciers. I am developing Debris Cover Tools, a suite of open-source, automated tools that provide glaciologists with an accessible and easy to implement approach to account for rock debris on glaciers. While my end focus is on large scale processes, there is a lot of very small scale work behind it, down to individual glaciers and individual rock clasts within a debris cover.
